mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO as memNo, MEM_PWD as memPwd, MEM_POSITION as memPosition, DEPT_CODE as deptCode, MEM_NAME as memName, MEM_BIRTH as memBirth, MEM_GENDER as memGender, MEM_ADDRESS as memAddress, MEM_PHONE as memPhone, MEM_TELL as memTell, MEM_EMAIL as memEmail, MEM_PROFILE as memProfile, MEM_HOLIDAY_COUNT as memHolidayCount, MEM_JOIN_DATE as memJoinDate, MEM_RESIGN_YN as memResignYN, MEM_RESIGN_DATE as memResignDate, MEM_DEL_YN as memDelYN, MEM_DEL_DATE as memDelDate, MEM_RIGHT_CODE as memRightCode, MEM_RIGHT_DATE as memRightDate, DEPT_NAME as deptName FROM MEMBER INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT USING (DEPT_CODE) WHERE MEM_DEL_YN='N' AND MEM_RESIGN_YN='N' ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC

SELECT MEM_NO as memNo, MEM_PWD as memPwd, MEM_POSITION as memPosition, DEPT_CODE as deptCode, MEM_NAME as memName, MEM_BIRTH as memBirth, MEM_GENDER as memGender, MEM_ADDRESS as memAddress, MEM_PHONE as memPhone, MEM_TELL as memTell, MEM_EMAIL as memEmail, MEM_PROFILE as memProfile, MEM_HOLIDAY_COUNT as memHolidayCount, MEM_JOIN_DATE as memJoinDate, MEM_RESIGN_YN as memResignYN, MEM_RESIGN_DATE as memResignDate, MEM_DEL_YN as memDelYN, MEM_DEL_DATE as memDelDate, MEM_RIGHT_CODE as memRightCode, MEM_RIGHT_DATE as memRightDate, DEPT_NAME as deptName FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY M.MEM_RESIGN_DATE DESC) AS RNUM, M.*, D.DEPT_NAME FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (M.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_CODE) WHERE (MEM_DEL_YN='Y' OR MEM_RESIGN_YN='Y')) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
SELECT COUNT(*) as memDeleteCount FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_DEL_YN='Y' OR MEM_RESIGN_YN='Y'
